subject: United States Open (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: With both Rory McIlroy and Graeme McDowell of Northern Ireland in the world’s top-10 rankings, how is it that a country of roughly 1.6 million people is flying so high?
snippet: With both Rory McIlroy and Graeme McDowell of Northern Ireland in the world’s top-10 rankings, how is it that a country of roughly 1.6 million people is flying so high?
